title: Don't let this one get away! 2 BR, 2.5 BA. Prime Stone Mountain location
posting_body: ['The Park At East Ponce', 'RENT:', 'Please call', 'SIZE:', '1354 sq ft', 'BEDROOMS:', '2', 'BATHROOMS:', '2.5', 'LEASE TERMS:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'show contact info', 'UNIT FEATURES:', '❖ Carpet', '❖ Ceiling Fans', '❖ Cozy Fireplaces', '❖ Dining Room', '❖ Dishwasher', '❖ Disposal', '❖ Extra Storage', '❖ Patio/Balcony', '❖ Range w/Oven', '❖ Refrigerator', '❖ Air Conditioning', '❖ Custom Cabinetry', '❖ Hardwood Flooring', '❖ Individual Climate Control', '❖ Newly Renovated Apartments', '❖ Roommate Floor Plans', '❖ Townhomes Available', '❖ Trash Compactor', '❖ Washer & Dryer Connections', '❖ Window Coverings', "The living spaces at The Park at East Ponce are thoughtfully designed with comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other apartments for rent in Stone Mountain, GA.", 'The Park at East Ponce is ideally situated to give you easy access to the best of what the area has to offer.', 'PROPERTY FEATURES:', '❖ Fitness Center', '❖ Gated Community', '❖ Laundry Facilities', '❖ On-Site Maintenance', '❖ On-Site Patrol', '❖ Outdoor Area', '❖ Outdoor Grill', '❖ Pool/Clubhouse Wi-Fi', '❖ Storage Space', '❖ Valet Trash', '❖ Fax/Copy Services', '❖ Green and Flowered Areas', '❖ Monthly Resident Events', '❖ On-Site Maintenance', '❖ On-Site Management', '❖ Package Receiving', '❖ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '❖ Resort Style Swimming Pool', '❖ Three Clothes Care Centers', '❖ Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', 'PET POLICY:', 'We welcome your pets for a maximum of 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Pet fee is $300.', '$15 Monthly Pet Fee.', 'Weight limit is 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for more information.', 'VISIT OR CALL US TODAY!', '1900 Tree Mountain Pkwy', 'Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Admin Fee: $135 - Non-Refundable', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '67DFEC1A07C44FB']
